metadata.title: CVE-2023-7045 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A CSRF vulnerability exists within GitLab CE/EE from versions 13.11 before16.10.6, from 16.11 before 16.11.3, from 17.0 before 17.0.1. By leveragingthis vulnerability, an attacker could exfiltrate anti-CSRF tokens via theKubernetes Agent Server (KAS).

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
